verses.verse: <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H3212>"Depart,<s%> go <S%H5927>up<s%> from <S%H5971>here,<s%> you and the people that you have brought <S%H5927>up<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> of which I <S%H7650>swore<s%> to <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> to <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> and to <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H5414><s%> 'I will give it to your <S%H2233>seed.<s%>'

I will <S%H7971>send<s%> an <S%H4397>angel<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H1644>you;<s%> and I will drive out the <S%H3669>Canaanite,<s%> the <S%H567>Amorite,<s%> and the <S%H2850>Hittite,<s%> and the <S%H6522>Perizzite,<s%> the <S%H2340>Hivite,<s%> and the <S%H2983>Jebusite:<s%>

to a <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H2100>flowing<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey:<s%> for I will not go <S%H5927>up<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of <S%H7186>you,<s%> for you are a stiff-necked <S%H5971>people,<s%> lest I <S%H3615>consume<s%> you in the <S%H1870>way.<s%>"
When the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> this <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1697>news,<s%> they <S%H56>mourned:<s%> and no <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H7896>put<s%> on his <S%H5716>jewelry.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>"Tell<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H7186><s%> 'You are a stiff-necked <S%H5971>people.<s%> If I were to go <S%H5927>up<s%> into your <S%H7130>midst<s%> for <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7281>moment,<s%> I would <S%H3615>consume<s%> <S%H3381>you.<s%> Therefore now take off your <S%H5716>jewelry<s%> from <S%H3045>you,<s%> that I may know what to do to <S%H6213>you.<s%>'"
The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5337>stripped<s%> themselves of their <S%H5716>jewelry<s%> from <S%H2022>Mount<s%> Horeb <S%H2722>onward.<s%>

Now <S%H4872>Moses<s%> used to <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H168>tent<s%> and to <S%H5186>pitch<s%> it <S%H2351>outside<s%> the <S%H4264>camp,<s%> far <S%H7368>away<s%> from the <S%H4264>camp,<s%> and he <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H168>it<s%> "The Tent of <S%H4150>Meeting.<s%>" It happened that everyone who <S%H1245>sought<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> to the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting,<s%> which was <S%H2351>outside<s%> the <S%H4264>camp.<s%>

It happened that when <S%H4872>Moses<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> to the <S%H168>Tent,<s%> that all the <S%H5971>people<s%> rose <S%H6965>up,<s%> and <S%H5324>stood,<s%> <S%H376>everyone<s%> at their <S%H168>tent<s%> <S%H6607>door,<s%> <S%H310>and<s%> <S%H5027>watched<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> until he had <S%H935>gone<s%> into the <S%H168>Tent.<s%>

It <S%H4872>happened,<s%> when Moses <S%H935>entered<s%> into the <S%H168>Tent,<s%> that the <S%H5982>pillar<s%> of <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H3381>descended,<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>Tent,<s%> and <S%H1696>spoke<s%> with <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

All the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H5982>pillar<s%> of <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H5975>stand<s%> at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>Tent,<s%> and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> rose <S%H6965>up<s%> and <S%H7812>worshiped,<s%> <S%H376>everyone<s%> at their <S%H168>tent<s%> <S%H6607>door.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6440>face<s%> to <S%H6440>face,<s%> as a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H1696>speaks<s%> to his <S%H7453>friend.<s%> He turned <S%H7725>again<s%> into the <S%H4264>camp,<s%> but his <S%H8334>servant<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun,<s%> a young <S%H5288>man,<s%> <S%H4185>didn't<s%> depart <S%H4185>out<s%> of the <S%H168>Tent.<s%>

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H7200>"Behold,<s%> you <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H5927>me,<s%> 'Bring up this <S%H5971>people:<s%>' and you <S%H3045>haven't<s%> let me know whom you will <S%H7971>send<s%> with <S%H559>me.<s%> Yet you have said, <S%H3045><s%> 'I know you by <S%H8034>name,<s%> and you have also <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2580>favor<s%> in my <S%H5869>sight.<s%>'

Now <S%H4672>therefore,<s%> if I have found <S%H2580>favor<s%> in your <S%H5869>sight,<s%> please <S%H3045>show<s%> me now your <S%H1870>ways,<s%> that I may <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H4672>you,<s%> so that I may find <S%H2580>favor<s%> in your <S%H5869>sight:<s%> and <S%H7200>consider<s%> that this <S%H1471>nation<s%> is your <S%H5971>people.<s%>"
He <S%H559>said,<s%> "My <S%H6440>presence<s%> will <S%H3212>go<s%> with <S%H5117>you,<s%> and I will give you rest."
He <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H6440>him,<s%> "If your presence <S%H1980>doesn't<s%> go with <S%H5927>me,<s%> don't carry us up from here.

For how would people <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H645>that<s%> I have <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2580>favor<s%> in your <S%H5869>sight,<s%> I and your <S%H5971>people?<s%> <S%H3212>Isn't<s%> it in that you go with <S%H6395>us,<s%> so that we are separated, I and your <S%H5971>people,<s%> from all the <S%H5971>people<s%> who are on the <S%H6440>surface<s%> of the <S%H127>earth?<s%>"

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> "I will <S%H6213>do<s%> this <S%H1697>thing<s%> also that you have <S%H1696>spoken;<s%> for you have <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2580>favor<s%> in my <S%H5869>sight,<s%> and I <S%H3045>know<s%> you by <S%H8034>name.<s%>"
He <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4994>"Please<s%> <S%H7200>show<s%> me your <S%H3519>glory.<s%>"

He <S%H559>said,<s%> "I will make all my <S%H2898>goodness<s%> <S%H5674>pass<s%> before <S%H7121>you,<s%> and will proclaim the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H2603>you.<s%> I will be gracious to whom I will be <S%H2603>gracious,<s%> and will show <S%H7355>mercy<s%> on whom I will show <S%H7355>mercy.<s%>"
He <S%H559>said,<s%> "You <S%H3201>cannot<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> my <S%H6440>face,<s%> for <S%H120>man<s%> may not <S%H7200>see<s%> me and <S%H2425>live.<s%>"
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> also <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4725>"Behold,<s%> there is a place by <S%H5324>me,<s%> and you shall stand on the <S%H6697>rock.<s%>

It will <S%H3519>happen,<s%> while my glory passes <S%H5674>by,<s%> that I will <S%H7760>put<s%> you in a <S%H5366>cleft<s%> of the <S%H6697>rock,<s%> and will <S%H5526>cover<s%> you with my <S%H3709>hand<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> I have passed <S%H5674>by;<s%>
then I will <S%H5493>take<s%> away my <S%H3709>hand,<s%> and you will <S%H7200>see<s%> my <S%H268>back;<s%> but my <S%H6440>face<s%> shall not be <S%H7200>seen.<s%>"
